query:
UPDATE products SET 
  name = 'Wutai Mountain Blessed Libra Guardian Pendant',
  shortDescription = 'Harmony, Justice, And Diplomatic Grace - The Sacred Guardian of Libra',
  description = 'In the celestial wisdom of Western astrology, Libra (September 23 - October 22) embodies harmony, justice, and diplomatic grace. This sacred pendant has been consecrated by senior monks at Wutai Mountain, one of China''s Four Great Buddhist Mountains and a UNESCO World Cultural Heritage site.

**Spiritual Significance:**
Libra individuals are blessed with unique cosmic energies that shape their destiny and character. This pendant serves as a spiritual anchor, connecting you to the celestial forces that guide your path.

**Consecration Ritual:**
Each pendant is blessed by enlightened masters at Wutai Mountain through sacred consecration ceremonies. These senior monks, having devoted decades to spiritual cultivation, channel divine energy and protective blessings into each piece. Through continuous sutra recitation and ritual offerings, the masters infuse every pendant with spiritual power that shields the wearer from negative influences and attracts auspicious fortune.

**Design & Craftsmanship:**
Crafted from premium silver with a luminous crescent moon design, this pendant features intricate constellation engravings that glow softly in the dark—a reminder of the celestial protection that watches over you.

**Who Should Wear This:**
- Those born under Libra (September 23 - October 22)
- Individuals seeking to enhance their natural Libra qualities
- Anyone facing life transitions or seeking spiritual guidance
- Those who wish to align with cosmic energies for prosperity

May this sacred talisman connect you to the wisdom of the stars and guide you through life''s journey with divine protection.'
WHERE id = 510019;

UPDATE products SET 
  name = 'Wutai Mountain Blessed Scorpio Guardian Pendant',
  shortDescription = 'Intensity, Transformation, And Profound Insight - The Sacred Guardian of Scorpio',

May this sacred talisman connect you to the wisdom of the stars and guide you through life''s journey with divine protection.'
WHERE id = 510020;
